name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 14:51 on August 1, 2023, the Yiwu Fire Rescue Detachment Command Center received a report that a traffic accident occurred near the Lingyun Overpass on Airport Road, Beiyuan Street, and a car caught fire. It was confirmed at the scene that the NIO ES8 electric car (Zhejiang AD186XX) driven by the driver surnamed Shen was driving on Airport Road and hit a road pillar near the Lingyun Overpass section (a one-way accident), causing the vehicle to catch fire and the driver to die.

content:
In the early morning of August 2, Baigou, Hebei, was urgently evacuated due to flood discharge, and a late-night escape took place, with vehicles lined up on the road.
According to the video, the surrounding villages have been occupied, and tens of thousands of people are gathering in Gaobeidian for refuge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 2, the Cyberspace Administration of China drafted a draft opinion that mobile phones will add a minor mode for users aged 16 to 18, and the default usage time of smart terminals will not exceed 2 hours per day.

Netizen contribution 
On August 2, CCTV released a helicopter rescue video on the rooftop, but netizens in the comment area found it to be fake
The reason is that the video accidentally captured two people standing in the water downstairs.
Netizens questioned that the water here was not deep enough to submerge the wheels, and there was no need for helicopter rescue at all.

On the overpass at the exit of Dazhongsi subway station on Beijing Line 13
A bridge guard sticks to his post in the heavy rain.

Previous: After the Sitong Bridge incident, a large number of bridge guards were arranged in Beijing to prevent similar incidents from happening again.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Another netizen added that the reason for the traffic jam in Baigou last night was that the highway toll station was still charging tolls during the evacuation phase.
On August 2, the local highway management department responded that it was because they had not received a notice of free highway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Click carefully] Netizen submission
On the evening of August 2, a major traffic accident occurred at the T-junction of Sudi Road and Hubei Road in Quanshan District, Xuzhou City, Jiangsu Province. The number of casualties at the scene is still unclear. Most of the injured were pedestrians during the evening rush hour after work, including many women and children.
In the video, a woman was bleeding heavily from her head and was in critical condition. From the existing video analysis, the vehicle involved in the accident should be a green Mini, which for some reason drove to the safety island to wait for pedestrians at the traffic light.
There is no official report or related surveillance video, so it is impossible to determine the cause of the accident.
The section of the road where the accident occurred is located on the main trunk road in the city and close to the tourist area. Such a serious car accident is rare in recent years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On August 1, Hu Xijin released a video saying that the flooding of Zhuozhou "to divert floodwaters to protect Beijing" was a false rumor that went against common sense.
However, the news on that day mentioned the diversion of floodwaters in the Yongding River upstream of Zhuozhou many times when reporting on the Beijing floods.
He also said that flood diversion is "upstream to save downstream", so "Zhuozhou sacrificed itself to save Beijing" is an unfounded conjecture, and it is the law of nature that water flows to lower places.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The saddest sacrifice in the world is that you die, but the person you saved says you deserve to be downstream.

name: 李老师不是你老师
